summary: Adds a Dremora companion/follower to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Dremora companion/follower to the game. He can be found in a small tunnel beneath the Riverwood bridge, which you can access by using a manhole. Reference the screenshots for more details. 

He should be fully functional, so he should have the wait, do this, trade with me, and all the other default commands that every other follower has, but tell me if there are any bugs that need to be fixed.

This mod was made on request for KOFFEYKID on the Nexus Forums. I hope you guys like it!
author: RitchieTheMerc - Me
